titlestmt.titleproper: Goodson, William Wilson, Jr., collector. Science fiction fanzines and related papers collected by William Wilson Goodson Jr., 1970-2008 (SF-3136): PRELIMINARY BOX LIST.

titlepage.titleproper: Goodson, William Wilson, Jr., collector. Science fiction fanzines and related papers collected by William Wilson Goodson Jr., 1970-2008: PRELIMINARY BOX LIST.
titlepage.author: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library
titlepage.p: © 2015 The President and Fellows of Harvard College

did.repository: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library, Harvard University
did.unittitle: William Wilson Goodson Jr. collection of science fiction fanzines and related papers,
did.abstract: Preliminary box list only for science fiction fanzines and related papers collected by William Wilson Goodson Jr.

processinfo.p: Accessioned by: Grace Dhamraj and Melanie Wisner

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on physical access to this material. Collection is open for research.

bioghist.p: William Wilson Goodson is an audiovisual specialist in higher education and a researcher, as well as a collector of science fiction.

arrangement.p: Arranged in two series: I. Science fiction fanzines, arranged alphabetically by title (titles beginning with "The" are found under the letter "T"); and II. Correspondence and related papers.

scopecontent.p: Comprised of fanzines (1970-2008); also with correspondence (1974-1987); other fanzines; and convention material.

relatedmaterial.p: Additional science fiction material held by the Houghton Library can be found by searching HOLLIS Classic for “SF” as “Other call number”. This will provide a list of all the material specifically in the Science Fiction Collection, but not all material by some science fiction authors in author collections. For this reason, it is often preferable to search by author or title. A finding aid is available for a separate collection of fanzines and prozines, SF 3133.
